duties_responsibilities.duty: Process payments for all invoices and issue timely payments for goods and services purchased.
Ensure proper coding of invoices, departmental approvals, and enter information into the Accounting system with a high degree of accuracy.
Match purchase orders, packing slips, and invoices and reconcile vendor statements.
Respond efficiently to vendor inquiries and ensure payments are in accordance with vendor terms.
Assist with Purchase Card and Travel & Expense processing, approvals, and ensure policy compliance.
Review and research missing invoices and perform month-end closing and year-end reconciliations.
Assist in preparing accounts payable related financial reports for management and perform bank reconciliations.

education_certification.credential: 1-3 years of previous experience in Accounts Payables in a high volume and fast-paced environment.
Strong technical knowledge of Microsoft Office applications including strong Excel skills.
Previous experience with Microsoft Great Plains and Certify expense systems is preferred.
Exceptional customer service and communication skills.
Strong analytical skills to assess problems and develop solutions.
Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
